MR No. 1590 - Ministers to Stand Firm for Principles

     (Written June 15, 1904, from Nashville, Tennessee, to Elder I. H. Evans.) 

     It is presented to me that you are in trouble, and that satanic agencies are working through unconsecrated men who are not walking in the light of truth but are setting their will against the will of God. Fallen angels mingle with fallen men to war against good. Everything but the Word of God controlling their heart is powerless against the passion that sways unconsecrated minds.
